You see, Bell-chan…… when she was young had a 
bitter experience, and because of that, she 
struggles when she's in front of a crowd.

text_block_list.text:

wide grounds of the Mejiro, in a training area that 
not many people see, she's been working as hard as she can―
text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer

text_block_list.text:

the environment she's been raised in, being in front of crowds… 
and particularly men, she still struggles with it now.
text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer

text_block_list.text:
That's why, in a real race, where the gaze of many, 
many people can be felt, she can't seem to show 
even a fraction of her true strength.
text_block_list.name: Chief Trainer

text_block_list.text:
Even though she came here because she wanted to enter races, 
wanted to win, it must be tough. It must have been painful this 
whole time…… But, you see.

text_block_list.text: ――Even with all that, Bell-chan, still hasn't given up.
